title: Group farming
creator_credit: Don Simmons and Australian Rural Adjustment Unit
brief_description: Considers the advantages and disadvantages of group farming. Discusses the issues involved in the sharing or pooling by farmers of resources such as machinery and sheds.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Simmons and Australian Rural Adjustment Unit
